channel.title: Nobody can login to my server. any help?
channel.description: Hey everyone i was hoping to get some help. I have a server and client and nobody can login to my server. I have no-ip on and i have a port through windows firewall ive never had this problem b4 if u can help me well all of u i would really appreciate it alot thanks!

item.title: Nobody can login to my server. any help?
item.dc:creator: @undertaxxx undertaxxx
item.description:
@undertaxxx wrote:

It can also be that youy isp gives you a dynmic ip, meaning that it’ll change afther a certain amout of time. You can solve this by going to www.no-ip.com and make an account. afther that register an adress as your static ip. Then download that DUS 2.2.1 client, that will automaticly update all your hosts (ips) with the dynamic ip.

So basicly this ‘host’ will redict people that want to connect to your dynamic ip.
But this is propably only for the most DLS users.

If you’re using a router, portforward it, and open all your ports (43594 in most cases) on the computer that you serve with.

You might want to try and shut down any firewalls, even though i don’t recommend it.

Read full topic
item.source: Nobody can login to my server. any help?

item.source: Nobody can login to my server. any help?

item.title: Nobody can login to my server. any help?
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

Have you been able to host your server before, if you have, have you recently restarted/turned off your router? If you have you’ll have to portforward again because you have a dynamic ip - changed each time you switch your router off, to fix this you need to make it static - TuT on www.portforward.com

~Johno

Read full topic
